mapper.insert: insert into prefer_tbl (userid, movie_genre, prefer_date) values (#{userid}, #{movie_genre}, now())
mapper.select: select movie_link, movie_kor, b.movie_no from bookmark_tbl as b right join movie_data_tbl as d on b.movie_no = d.movie_no group by d.movie_no order by count(b.movie_no) desc limit 20
select * from movie_data_tbl order by movie_code desc limit 20;

select d.movie_link, d.movie_kor, d.movie_no, count(r.movie_no) from movie_review_tbl as r right join movie_data_tbl as d on r.movie_no = d.movie_no group by d.movie_no order by count(r.movie_no) desc limit 20;
select d.movie_link, d.movie_kor, d.movie_no, avg(rate) from movie_review_tbl as r right join movie_data_tbl as d on r.movie_no = d.movie_no group by d.movie_no order by avg(r.rate) desc limit 20;
SELECT * FROM movie_data_tbl ORDER BY hit DESC limit 20
